page.title: 19Family happenings in Lydden
page.content: Jim and Ruth KingÂ£s little boy,James, has had a very feverish cold throughout the night and so Ruth is writing this report today as she is too tired to paint the ceiling coving.An ex-pupil arrived to say that she was now working for Dover CustomÂ£s Office.JimÂ£s uncle Fred has been living with Ruth and Jim and he has been landscaping the garden. However,he has gone into Dover today as June has been so wet and cold that much outside work has come to a halt. Jim and Ruth hope that the weather will be much better next Wednesday when the church will be holding a barbecue.They intend to make preparations for the event this weekend.They are not sure whether this wiil be possible because James has been ill during the day.He has been crying a great deal and Ruth has had to give her full attention to him.
